statement.p: In 64 of the last 25 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{25}}={0.64}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{25}. \displaystyle{P}={0.64}\cdot{25}={16}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 25-16=9 We round that as requested to 9.
